meanings.definition: Having a high degree of heat or a high temperature.
meanings.sent1: The sun is the hottest star in our solar system.
meanings.sent2: The hottest day of summer made everyone seek shade.
meanings.sent3: The hottest chili pepper made him breathe fire like a dragon.
meanings.sent4: Her temper was like the hottest flame, quick to ignite.
meanings.sent5: The hottest stove burned brightly in the kitchen.

meanings.definition: Having a high degree of intensity or excitement.
meanings.sent1: The hottest race of the season kept everyone on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent2: The hottest concert in town had people lining up for tickets.
meanings.sent3: The hottest video game level had him jumping with joy.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves were the hottest topic of the night.
meanings.sent5: The hottest gossip spread like wildfire among friends.

meanings.sent1: The hottest fashion trend this year is neon colors.
meanings.sent2: The hottest movie at the box office is breaking records.
meanings.sent3: The hottest toy of the season flew off the shelves in minutes.
meanings.sent4: Her latest song became the hottest hit on the charts.
